title: Klein and Luna on Abolition in Brazil - claim

content.question: Which of the following claims is best supported by the evidence in the source?

choices.label: The example of Brazil encouraged emancipation in other countries in the Americas.
The Haitian Revolution inspired Brazilians to abolish the institution of slavery in Brazil.
The actions of enslaved people helped to pressure enslavers into ending slavery in Brazil.
Slave narratives by African Americans contributed to the decline of slavery in Brazil.

content.answer: The actions of enslaved people helped to pressure enslavers into ending slavery in Brazil.

topic.text: 2.16: Diasporic Connections: Slavery and Freedom in Brazil
